Name: TAKANARIA
About the game: TAKANARIA is a very simple game created with Pixel art. You will be controlling Anensi, a botanist, and Yaful, a manager of a desert islands in TAKANARIA islands, to discover the island. There is no story to complete as there is no concept of clearing stages. Enjoy the beautiful scenery of the islands and enjoy discovering the life of the islands.
